Posts.EditableText:
I want to make this game better in as much ways as possible. The first two parts aren't very good, in my view, and I need a lot of work for part 3 to come out. I hope it will be better and longer then the others. So basically, I need help in how to cut my time and stuff, so that I can finish it within two monthes at the least. I also need techniques not to give up, since I'm pretty much a newbie.
I really need your help. Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: If you have _specific_ questions on things you are having trouble with (using Quest), ask on the Quest forums.  People will be very helpful there.  Currently this question is a bit vague for me to volunteer any info!  =)
